titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 69) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-492, by Ms. Slaughter.
House Resolution 839 and House Resolution 850 are laid upon the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 170.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 869.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 184 (Roll no. 1156).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.J.Res. 69 (FY2008 Continuing Resolution).
